is one of the island's most peaceful spots. On the west coast of the island between
, the beach offers golden sands and there are bungalows, restaurants and shops along the seafront.
Take a taxi about 15 minutes from the main pier at Thong Sala. Or ride a motorbike, about 20 minutes from the pier.
A beautiful undiscovered bay fringed by palm trees, with wonderful sunset views.

value: content=Serves Thai and Western food, seafood, BBQ, and vegetarian food. Has rooms from 500-3,000 baht.
content=Set in its own little cove. Not always open. Great for the Moon Set party.  Watch out for the biting ants!
content=Barman Mr. Ood does fire dancing most nights. Great spot.
content=Simple huts with hammocks. Dive centre next door.
directions=From Thong Sala head north for ten min by taxi. Sunset Hill is just before Haad Son and Haad Yao.
content=Sunset Hill Resort offers large apartments for 1-8 people. Ideal for families and groups.
